manageOrganisationsPageDescription: On this page, you can configure the organisational details for your additional IP block addresses, which will be used to customise WHOIS records.
manageOrganisationsPageHowto: You can then configure a specific RIPE or ARIN IP organisation by selecting the ‘Configure IP block details’ option in the menu of any IP block on the main IP list.
manageOrganisationsDelete_confirm_input: Enter the organisation name in the field below to confirm
manageOrganisationsDelete_confirm_headli: Do you want to delete this IP organisation?
manageOrganisationsDelete_confirm_descri: This will permanently delete the organisation
manageOrganisationsDelete_unknown_error: An error has occurred deleting the organisation: {{error}}
manageOrganisationsDelete_includedInIpBl: This IP organisation is always used with specific IP blocks. Please unlink it first.
